headline: OpenAI launches web browser to compete with Google Chrome
summary: OpenAI said Tuesday it is introducing its own web browser, Atlas, putting the ChatGPT maker in direct competition with Google as more internet users rely on artificial intelligence to answer their questions.  OpenAI said Atlas launches Tuesday on Apple laptops and will later come to Microsoft’s Windows, Apple’s iOS phone operating system and Google’s Android phone system.  OpenAI CEO Sam Altman called it a “rare, once-a-decade opportunity to rethink what a browser can be about and how to use one.”

raw.headline: OpenAI launches web browser to compete with Google Chrome
raw.summary: OpenAI said Tuesday it is introducing its own web browser, Atlas, putting the ChatGPT maker in direct competition with Google as more internet users rely on artificial intelligence to answer their questions.  OpenAI said Atlas launches Tuesday on Apple laptops and will later come to Microsoft’s Windows, Apple’s iOS phone operating system and Google’s Android phone system.  OpenAI CEO Sam Altman called it a “rare, once-a-decade opportunity to rethink what a browser can be about and how to use one.”

headline: Nvidia Stock At Key Level As Magnificent Seven Earnings Loom

Is Nvidia stock a buy or sell now?

headline: Mag 7 Earnings Could Spark a Year-End Surge. What the Charts of Meta, Google, Amazon Say.
summary: After a brief pause, one of the market’s key leadership groups, the Magnificent Seven, is firming up again.  All components except  Nvidia  are scheduled to report earnings by the end of next week, and those results could set the tone for a year-end rally.  The stock broke out of a bull flag formation to close at a new all-time high.

headline: Keysight Enables SK hynix to Achieve Top-Tier OCP S.A.F.E. Evaluation for Solid-State Drive Solution
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., October 21, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) has enabled SK hynix to earn its first Open Compute Project (OCP) Security Appraisal Framework and Enablement (S.A.F.E.) recognition for a solid-state drive (SSD) solution. This accomplishment represents a pioneering industry collaboration, underscoring Keysight’s commitment to empowering innovators and securing the technology supply chain.

headline: Apple nears $4T market cap. Is it catching up in the AI race?
summary: Apple (AAPL) closed at a record high on Monday, has reportedly had strong iPhone 17 sales, received multiple upgrades and price target boosts from Wall Street analysts this week, and is on track to hit a $4 trillion market capitalization — replacing Microsoft (MSFT) as the second-most valuable public company in the world. Yahoo Finance Senior Business Reporter Ines Ferré and Sevens Report Research founder Tom Essaye join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss Apple's comeback in the artificial intelligence (AI) race. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

Yahoo Finance Senior Business Reporter Ines Ferré and Sevens Report Research founder Tom Essaye join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss Apple's comeback in the artificial intelligence (AI) race. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Amazon Cloud Reputation Takes Hit After Outage Lasting 15 Hours
summary: The incident, which some analysts are calling Amazon’s worst outage since 2021, reminded the world of the perils of depending on a handful of cloud companies to deliver crucial computing and internet services.  Outages like Monday’s strike at a core premise of the cloud: that a centralized operation full of sharp engineers will keep servers running better and more efficiently than individual companies’ own staff.
